short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goblin Slayer Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Goblin Slayer background. Custom Goblin Slayer wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Goblin Slayer wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your Goblin Slayer background by randomizing or selecting your favorite in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Convenient links to email and social media accounts for quick access.
5. Displays the current date and time on every new tab.
6. New note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google apps for enhanced productivity.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Simplified sharing options for social media.
13. Instant download options for new wallpapers.
14. One-click access to a variety of games.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Goblin Slayer tab.
